ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_1: If you want to travel somewhere around the world but you can’t find anyone to go with you, we have a solution.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: Our goal is to help people in this situation by finding the best partner to travel together, so you can have a wonderful experience.

CREATE_TRIP.TERMS: I have read and agree to the
CREATE_TRIP.TITLE: Title
CREATE_TRIP.WARNING_DATE: End date can not been set before the start date
CREATE_TRIP.WARNING_DATE_MIN: Can not set a past date

GDPR.TEXT_1: In this article we explain how we collect and use personal data.
GDPR.TEXT_11: Personal information may be stored in a number of locations,
GDPR.TEXT_12: depending upon the nature of the information and how it was acquired
GDPR.TEXT_13: (e.g. through being engaged to handle a matter or through a consensual subscription or contact request).
GDPR.TEXT_14: Information relating to engagements typically resides in our database in Heroku.
GDPR.TEXT_15: This includes any documents that you send us or that we produce.
GDPR.TEXT_16: Heroku is a secure server and is accessed via an encrypted network connection.
GDPR.TEXT_17: There may be working copies and backups of those documents on a system within our team devices.
GDPR.TEXT_18: Information relating to matters that we handle is only retained as long as necessary.
GDPR.TEXT_19: This typically means that once a matter has been completed,
GDPR.TEXT_2: Our access and handling of this information is subject to the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR).
GDPR.TEXT_20: we will only retain your information for long enough to ensure that any supplementary queries or further actions can be handled.
GDPR.TEXT_21: We would not retain information for more than one year beyond the end of our engagement unless there is a specific requirement to do so.
GDPR.TEXT_22: Once an engagement is completed we may, with your consent,
GDPR.TEXT_23: retain your information in our customer database so that we can follow up with you in future on possible engagements or keep you informed.
GDPR.TEXT_25: You have the right to request access (i.e. copies of) all your personal information held by us.
GDPR.TEXT_26: We will provide this information within thirty days of having received your request by mail (way.team.soft@gmail.com).
GDPR.TEXT_27: Where applicable, you can have your data in a “portable” format.
GDPR.TEXT_28: You have the right to ensure any information we retain is accurate.
GDPR.TEXT_29: You can inform us of any changes to your personal information and we will update our records.
GDPR.TEXT_30: You have the right to have your personal information erased,
GDPR.TEXT_31: provided it is no longer required for the handling of any unresolved matter or legal proceeding.
GDPR.TEXT_32: You have the right to restrict the use of your information under certain circumstances.
GDPR.TEXT_33: You also have the right to object against the use of your personal information,
GDPR.TEXT_34: for example by withdrawing consent to be contacted for direct marketing purposes.
GDPR.TEXT_36: A data breach is any occasion where security measures have been deliberately or accidentally circumvented in order to access, alter, disclose or destroy personal information.
GDPR.TEXT_37: For example, if unauthorised parties have gained access to and potentially obtained copies of your personal information from our systems.
GDPR.TEXT_38: In the unlikely event that there is a personal data breach that represents a risk to individuals or their businesses,
GDPR.TEXT_39: we will inform the Information Commissioners Office (ICO) within 72 hours of becoming aware of it.
GDPR.TEXT_4: Any issue we manage on your behalf typically makes it necessary to provide us with information.
GDPR.TEXT_5: Depending upon the nature of the issue, the specific information may vary.
GDPR.TEXT_6: However, we will only request information that is relevant and required for managing the issue in question.
GDPR.TEXT_7: If the matter includes the gathering and assessing of evidence,
GDPR.TEXT_8: that evidence may include information that would be subject to GDPR and this policy.
GDPR.TEXT_9: For example, we collect personal information such as names and contact details via contact forms on our website and/or through voluntary subscriptions to premium version.
GDPR.TITLE: General Data Protection Regulation

PREMIUM.TEXT_1: With the premium version, you will enjoy our app without ads and your trips will have preferential location.
PREMIUM.TEXT_2: Also, you guarantee your identity and your possible companions will feel at ease.
PREMIUM.NEW_PREMIUM: Congratulations! You are a member of our Premium club
